Mikka

Introduction

Black Pearl was a four-member girl group under Core Contents Media. They debuted on July 16, 2007 with their debut stage on M! Countdown for the song "What Should I Do, I Like You".They disbanded on March 3, 2012 after the members focused on solo activities.
